title: Residential Tenancies Act 2016 (No. 17 of 2016)) of the Residential Tenancies
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Rent Pressure Zone (Local Electoral
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Rent Pressure Zone (Local Electoral 

Area of Bandon - Kinsale) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited rent pressure zone (local electoral area bandon - kinsale) order 2020

title: Residential Tenancies Act 2016 (No. 17 of 2016)) of the Residential Tenancies
heading: 2. The Order comes into operation on 16 July 2020.
text_raw: 2. The Order comes into operation on 16 July 2020.

title: Residential Tenancies Act 2016 (No. 17 of 2016)) of the Residential Tenancies
heading: 3. The area consisting of the Local Electoral Area of Bandon - Kinsale (as
text_raw:
3. The area consisting of the Local Electoral Area of Bandon - Kinsale (as 
provided for by the County of Cork Local Electoral Areas and Municipal 
Districts Order 2019 (S.I. No. 28 of 2019)) is prescribed as a rent pressure zone 
during the period commencing on 16 July 2020 and ending on 31 December
text_norm: 3 area consisting local electoral area bandon - kinsale (as provided county cork local electoral area municipal district order 2019 (s.i no 28 2019)) prescribed rent pressure zone period commencing 16 july 2020 ending 31 december

title: Residential Tenancies Act 2016 (No. 17 of 2016)) of the Residential Tenancies

2021.

title: Residential Tenancies Act 2016 (No. 17 of 2016)) of the Residential Tenancies
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Order provides for the designation of the Local Electoral Area of Bandon 
- Kinsale as a rent pressure zone under section 24A of the Residential 
Tenancies Act 2004 (as inserted by section 36 of the Planning and 
Development (Housing) and Residential Tenancies Act 2016), for the period 
commencing on 16 July 2020 and ending on 31 December 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [247]
